Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: A vase with a cylindrical body and a straight rounded rim. The walls are straight and taper towards the bottom and it has a base with a flat foot. Paste of a pink colour. The surface has a light-coloured coating. A decorative band runs from the rim to the lower third of the piece. Between horizontal lines asymmetrical geometrical motifs appear, distributed into metopae. The whole is painted in red and wine-red.
